name: Shepherd
description:
Formerly known as The Robin Shepherd Group, Shepherd is a Marketing, Public Relations and Digital agency based in Jacksonville, FL with offices in Atlanta.
We're a group very different by background and experiences, by personalities and specialties. We're artists. We're suits. We're techies and number crunchers, builders and dreamers and would-be alchemists trying to turn everything we touch into gold. But, as different as we may be, we're a group that just clicks together and with our clients.  
READ MORE...
